summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 KYMCO AGILITY. AFTER PARKING THE SCOOTER,  THE NEXT MORNING, THE CONTACT FOUND THAT IT HAD BURNED TO THE GROUND.  A FIRE AND A POLICE REPORT WERE FILED AND THERE WERE NO INJURIES. THE FIRE DEPARTMENT STATED THAT THERE WAS AN ELECTRICAL FAILURE. THE SCOOTER WAS DESTROYED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 4,300.   UPDATED 07/06/16.*JB
